info.name: painted Voronoi from Z-buffer
info.description:
reproducing an old SGI paper drawing cones along the z axis + using Z-buffer to select the nearest at each pixel.
alternative to https://www.shadertoy.com/view/MfSyzV

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define R    iResolution.xy
#define T(U) texelFetch( iChannel0, ivec2(U), 0 )
renderpass.name: Common

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    O = T(u);                        // previous state
    vec2  P = ( u - iMouse.xy ) / R.y;
    float d = length(P);             // cone z = d
    if ( d < O.a )                   // win Z-buffer test: pixel is closer to new shape
        O = d < .05 ? vec4(.7)       // draw disk then hue tail    
                    : .6 + .6 * cos(  atan(P.y,P.x) + vec4(0,23,21,0)  ),
        O.a = d;                     // new z
                     
    if (iFrame<1) O.a = 1e9;         // init z = inf.
}
renderpass.name: Buffer A
